name: projeto-mfe-food-root
description: Monorepo de Micro Front-ends para Delivery

scripts.dev:container: cd container-app && set NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true && npm run dev
scripts.dev:menu: cd menu-mfe && set NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true && npm run dev -- -p 3001
scripts.dev:order: cd order-mfe && set NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true && npm run dev -- -p 3002
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:container" "npm run dev:menu" "npm run dev:order"
